main.name: Sahibdeep Singh
main.bio: Hi there! I am Sahib! Build coding as my passion when I was in my 9th grade and since then I have been learning and building new things. I am a Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science and Engineering. I am a self-taught developer and I love to learn new things. I am a quick learner and I am always ready to learn new technologies. I am a team player and I love to work in a team. I am a good communicator and I can communicate with people very easily. I am a good problem solver and I can solve problems very easily. I am a good listener and I can listen to people very easily. I am a good leader and I can lead a team very easily. I am a good learner and I can learn new things very easily. I am a good teacher and I can teach people very easily. I am a good mentor and I can mentor people very easily. I am a good friend and I can be a good friend to people very easily. I am a good person and I can be a good person to people very easily.
